channel.title: Blogs on Ziming Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Ziming Wang

item.title: A Production Setup for a Small-Scale Website on AWS
item.description: Setting up a production-ready AWS architecture for a small-scale website and deliver to the client

item.title: Distributed Consensus and Raft - A Survey
item.description: A research survey on distributed consensus, state machine replication, Paxos, and Raft. My project work for COMP90020 (Distributed Algorithms) at Unimelb

item.title: Middlewares for Data Syncing between ElasticSearch and PostgreSQL
item.description: PGSync, Logstash, and Elastic-Connector: pros and cons based on my experiments. Plus other data syncing options

item.title: Deploy ELK Stack on a Remote Ubuntu VM
item.description: Deploy ElasticSearch, Kibana, Logstash, and PostgreSQL (optionally) natively on a AWS EC2 Ubuntu VM

item.title: Good Tech Tutorials/Blogs/Sites
item.description: Some good tech tutorials/blogs/sites that I found helpful in my study and programming.
